name: You Have 10 Seconds (2023)
description:
You Have 10 Seconds is a fast paced arcade platformer where you’re spawned into a level and given ten seconds to work out how to reach the exit without dying before time runs out.

There are 25 Areas which each introduce a new mechanic to the gameplay, eventually creating extremely complex and difficult levels. Master collecting keys, swimming through acid, dodging motion sensors, time traveling, swapping dimensions, and so much more to clear areas as quickly as possible.


- Get a rating at the end of each Area depending on how well you performed! Steam achievements for S ranks!


- Unlock Steam achievements for completing certain challenges and finding secrets!


- A gauntlet of never ending randomized levels from the main game and more, how long can you survive?


- Removes all transitions between worlds and menu interactions for seamless gameplay for speedrunners.


- Some surprises hidden away that may not be found for a long, long time.
